question:
Which of the following poets of the Persian cult resided in the kingdom of Mahmud?
1) Unsuri
2) Faruqi
3) Asjadi
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Mahmud of Ghazni has acquired the reputation of an iconoclast but at the same time, his contribution to the socio-cultural development of his time was Significant. The earliest poets of the Persian revival which were Unsuri, Faruqi, and Asjadi all resided in his kingdom.
